T02D3087:186a-0: @186a * // bdag nyid bsnyen pa thob pas 'khrul 'khor 'ching bar 'dod na /
T02D3087:186a-1: dur khrod kyi ras la khrag dang dug dang lan
T02D3087:186a-2: tshva dang ske tshe la sogs pa'i khu bas 'khor
T02D3087:186a-3: lo mu khyud gnyis la bskor ba bris te /
T02D3087:186a-4: nang ma'i lta ba la bsgrub bya'i ming sa bon gyi yi ge bris pa'i phyi rol du /
T02D3087:186a-6: aom nas h'um drum bandha'i bar du bris pa'am mthar che ge mo m'a ra ya phat ces bri'o //
T02D3087:186a-7: rim pa gnyis pa la thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags m'a ra ya dang bcas par dgod do //
T02D3087:186a-8: de nas grog mkhar gyi sa dang /
T02D3087:186a-9: ba lang gi gci ba dang /
T02D3087:186a-11: bgegs kyi chu phar 'gram gyis las gzugs brnyan byas te /
T02D3087:186a-12: de'i snying gar 'khrul 'khor bcug ste dong gru gsum du gzhug go //
T02D3087:186a-13: de nas bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor rdzogs par bya /
T02D3087:186a-14: 'khor lo bsgrub byar bsams pa'i rten la phyag rgya'i
T02D3087:186a-15: tshogs la sogs pa kun bkug cing bcug par byas
T02D3087:186a-16: la / changs pa dang dbang po dang legs ldan
T02D3087:186a-17: drag po la sogs pa rnams la gtor ma byin
T02D3087:186a-18: la / te / gsol ba btab nas bzlas pa
T02D3087:186b-0: ni phyag rgya'i tshogs la @186b sogs pas bsgrub bya
T02D3087:186b-1: la / te / bkug cing / bcug nas bcings par bsams te /
T02D3087:186b-2: de nas lingga 'gul ba dang ldeg pa dang g-yo
T02D3087:186b-3: ba la sogs pa byung nas thams cad 'joms pa'i
T02D3087:186b-4: sngags kyis rig sngags bcad phur bas gdab par bya'o
T02D3087:186b-5: // tha mar sman ma rlung la 'phyar ba'am /
T02D3087:186b-7: yang na lingga la bzlas pa bya ste /
